title: Advances in UAV Avionics Systems Architecture, Classification and Integration: A Comprehensive Review and Future Perspectives
summary: Avionics systems of an Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) or drone are the critical electronic components found onboard that regulate, navigate, and control UAV travel while ensuring public safety.
